summary: Fix: default list command to show only pending todos (issue #2277)

triage.root_cause: TodoApp.list() defaulted to show_all=True, showing all todos including completed ones by default
triage.fix_location: src/flywheel/cli.py:36 (TodoApp.list method) and src/flywheel/cli.py:104 (run_command list handling)

risks.description: Users expecting todo list to show all todos will now see only pending
risks.mitigation: Document the change and recommend show_all=True for programmatic access

risks.description: The --pending flag is now idempotent with default behavior
risks.mitigation: Consider adding --all flag in future for showing all todos
